ch0106_00_kamitsure/0101_0701_01_10:
Hey there. Today’s looking pretty dazzling already,
don’t you think?
ch0106_00_kamitsure/0101_0701_02_10:
I think it’s time for the two of us to take a walk...
down the runway to victory, that is!
ch0106_00_kamitsure/0601_0701_01_10:
People watching you 24-7, never having a
moment to yourself...
ch0106_00_kamitsure/0601_0701_02_10:
That’s the life of a professional model.
There’s no such thing as a day off for me.
ch0106_00_kamitsure/0601_0701_03_10:
When I’m focusing on being a Pokémon Trainer,
though, I’m the one doing the watching!
ch0106_00_kamitsure/0601_0701_04_10:
I like to keep a close eye on my adorable
Pokémon. I don’t want to miss even the slightest
change in mood or behavior.
ch0106_00_kamitsure/0601_0702_01_10:
Oh, there are things I have to keep a close
eye on as a model, too...
ch0106_00_kamitsure/0601_0702_02_10:
I’ve gotta keep up with the fashion trends...
what’s in and what’s out. I can’t afford to miss
out on any of that juicy info!
ch0106_00_kamitsure/0602_0701_01_10:
I work hard as a model and a Gym Leader to
make every day shine.
ch0106_00_kamitsure/0602_0701_02_10:
Other than that, I dunno...
I guess I don’t really have any hobbies.
ch0106_00_kamitsure/0602_0701_03_10:
I get so caught up in Pokémon and fashion
that I can barely think of anything else!
It makes every day so much fun, though.
ch0106_00_kamitsure/0602_0702_01_10:
Life can be hard sometimes, sure. But the best
thing you can do is face your challenges head on!
ch0106_00_kamitsure/0602_0702_02_10:
If you can do that, you’ll discover things about
yourself that you never knew before. The whole
world will open up for you!
ch0106_00_kamitsure/0603_0701_01_10:
Sygna suits are all the rage on Pasio right now.
They’re so cute, I do a double take every time
I see a Trainer wearing one.
ch0106_00_kamitsure/0603_0701_02_10:
I hear they’re one of a kind. Supposedly, the
designer is all about creating signature looks for
certain Trainers and their Pokémon.
ch0106_00_kamitsure/0603_0701_03_10:
As a model and a Trainer, I’d love to get my
hands on a sygna suit of my own one day.
ch0106_00_kamitsure/0603_0702_01_10:
Only a select few Trainers have had sygna suits
designed for them so far, you know.
ch0106_00_kamitsure/0603_0702_02_10:
I wonder what a sygna suit designed specifically
for me would look like...
ch0106_00_kamitsure/0604_0701_01_10:
Have I ever told you how I first met Zebstrika?
It’s such a fantastic story.
ch0106_00_kamitsure/0604_0701_02_10:
One day, I got lost on my way home from a photo
shoot and it started to pour really hard outside.
ch0106_00_kamitsure/0604_0701_03_10:
I was running around, soaking wet, when I
heard a Pokémon cry. Then a second later,
I saw Zebstrika jolt out of a bush nearby.
ch0106_00_kamitsure/0604_0701_04_10:
The poor thing had been struck by a bolt of
lightning. Her mane was crackling with electricity.
ch0106_00_kamitsure/0604_0702_01_10: Zebstrika just stared up at me, not moving an inch.
ch0106_00_kamitsure/0604_0702_02_10:
Something about that moment felt like fate...
So I did the only thing I could think of at the time.
I caught her.
ch0106_00_kamitsure/0604_0702_03_10:
I know there’s no way of really knowing whether
the things that happen to us are fate or not...
But I felt it in my heart regardless.
ch0106_00_kamitsure/0605_0701_01_10:
I’d love to be with my sweet Pokémon every hour
of every day...
ch0106_00_kamitsure/0605_0701_02_10:
but it’s good to let our Pokémon rest up at a
Pokémon Center every now and then.
ch0106_00_kamitsure/0605_0701_03_10:
I mean, burnout is just the worst. You can’t do a
good job at work if you’re exhausted.
ch0106_00_kamitsure/0605_0701_04_10:
That goes for people, too! Take it easy and
make sure you give yourself some time to relax
and refresh, OK, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0106_00_kamitsure/0605_0702_01_10:
I think it’d be nice to get away from the big city
for a while. Maybe someplace remote, where
no one’s around.
ch0106_00_kamitsure/0605_0702_02_10:
I wouldn’t even care if it got dark outside.
Zebstrika can be my own little night-light.
ch0106_00_kamitsure/1701_0701_01_10:
Hey, just the person I was looking for!
I’ve got something for you.
ch0106_00_kamitsure/1701_0701_02_10:
It’s been a must-have item for me lately.
I highly recommend it.
ch0106_00_kamitsure/1701_0702_01_10:
I’ll let you know if I find anything else you’d be
interested in!
ch0106_00_kamitsure/2501_0701_01_10:
I think people shine the most when their hearts
are really full.
ch0106_00_kamitsure/2501_0701_02_10:
You can dress yourself up on the outside as
much as you want—fashion, jewelry, makeup—
but you can’t dress up your heart.
ch0106_00_kamitsure/2501_0701_03_10:
When you feel happy and content on the inside,
you’ll naturally be more positive and confident
on the outside.
ch0106_00_kamitsure/2501_0701_04_10:
That kind of inner light glows all around you—
enough that people can see the difference.
ch0106_00_kamitsure/2501_0702_01_10:
When I see someone that shines as brightly as
you do, it makes me want to do better, too.
ch0106_00_kamitsure/2501_0702_02_10:
You’re like a beam of sunshine!
So always remember to be yourself, OK?
ch0106_00_kamitsure/2511_0701_01_10:
Hey... There’s something I’ve been wanting to
talk to you about... Do you have a sec?
ch0106_00_kamitsure/2511_0701_02_10:
I’ve been meaning to tell you this for a while...
I just haven’t had the courage until now.
ch0106_00_kamitsure/2511_0701_03_10:
I know it’s Farfetch’d, but...be careful what
you wish for, [Name:PlayerNickname ]...
You Magnemite get it.
ch0106_00_kamitsure/2511_0701_04_10:
Ha ha ha! Oh, sweetie, I’m so sorry...
Maybe I should have kept my Meowth shut
after all!
ch0106_00_kamitsure/2511_0702_01_10:
OK, OK, I’m done now... Sometimes I like to
tell jokes to get a good back-and-forth going
with people.
ch0106_00_kamitsure/2511_0702_02_10:
Most people think I’d be too cool and sophisticated
to tell a silly joke, and I just love proving them
wrong! Isn’t this side of me fun?
ch0106_00_kamitsure/3001_0701_01_10:
Morning! Nice day, isn’t it?
If you’re still feeling groggy, you could try
doing some stretches. Works for me!
ch0106_00_kamitsure/3002_0701_01_10:
I love a good run in the morning.
Keeps me strong and beautiful!
ch0106_00_kamitsure/3003_0701_01_10:
The way the sun’s shining right now 
would be perfect for a photo shoot.
ch0106_00_kamitsure/3004_0701_01_10:
The weather will be cooling off soon.
Don’t forget to bring a cute jacket with
you if you’re heading out!
ch0106_00_kamitsure/3005_0701_01_10:
Evening!
There’s a nice, cool breeze out there tonight.
ch0106_00_kamitsure/3006_0701_01_10:
I’d never say no to some warm, glittering
sunshine, but moonlight has its own brilliant
beauty as well...
